linkTarget.anchoringText: Boscan field is a region of heavy oil from 9 to 12 ° API, It comes mainly from the sandy members of Boscan Lower- Boscan Top of Misoa Formation and sandstones of the basal section of the Icotea formation, located 45 km south-west of the city of Maracaibo in Zulia state, Venezuela (Fig. 1).

The general procedure of this combination is to make the unit run with coiled tubing (CT) and BHA cleaning (Fig. 2) composed of: shoe mill, flapper valve, collecting chamber, filter, cyclone bailer and engine's high torque which allows rotation directly on the bottom of the tool, working with pumping parameters to an average of 1.5 bpm to overcome the obstruction, performing test each 10ft pull forward, noting increased pressure and not get further advancement is indicative that the collecting chamber has reached its maximum capacity, so that pumping is reduced and proceeds to pull pipe and BHA cleaning surface; repeating the process until reaching the target depth and recover fully plug comprised of residues compacted with heavy crude elastomer, and samples collected in the collecting chamber were mainly sand, with no evidence of elastomers, to then proceed with cleaning conventional jet and pumping nitrogen allowing CT, to counteract the loss circulation well and recover the total obstruction of faster and cost effective way, additionally to the application of this technology cost is reduced by cleaning and operating well intervention time compared to conventional rehabilitation options drill.

The Cyclone Bailer is a tool operated by flow used in cleaning operations where circulation is not possible and the efficient removal of debris is required, consists of a top sub, nozzle section, output channel and bottom sub where it connects extension background filter (Fig. 3) between the nozzle section and the outlet channel diameter reduction occurs when the fluid there through; because it is a smaller area, the flow velocity increases and the pressure decreases in the narrow part, generating a strong vacuum, known as venturi (Fig. 4) effect described by Tipler, P., Mosca, G. (Ed. 2005), dragging the fluid and debris from the well into a collecting chamber (Bailer) by the strong suction effect, while the filter high performance allows fluid to pass through the ring but traps, collects and stores any debris or waste within section between the flapper valve bailer bottom and filter in the top section of the chamber.

The Cyclone Bailer is a tool operated by flow used in cleaning operations where circulation is not possible and the efficient removal of debris is required, consists of a top sub, nozzle section, output channel and bottom sub where it connects extension background filter (Fig. 3) between the nozzle section and the outlet channel diameter reduction occurs when the fluid there through; because it is a smaller area, the flow velocity increases and the pressure decreases in the narrow part, generating a strong vacuum, known as venturi (Fig. 4) effect described by Tipler, P., Mosca, G. (Ed. 2005), dragging the fluid and debris from the well into a collecting chamber (Bailer) by the strong suction effect, while the filter high performance allows fluid to pass through the ring but traps, collects and stores any debris or waste within section between the flapper valve bailer bottom and filter in the top section of the chamber.

The cyclone bailer is used to remove debris inside the pipe and bottomhole a shoe mill, flapper valve and Collecting chamber (Bailer), they are run typically below the tool to remove, collect and retain solid waste while being pumped through the unit continuous pipe occurs, the solids are removing and Bailer is filled completely with sand or solid residues from the bottom up until you reach the filter screen and achieve maximum storage capacity of the bailer (Fig. 5).

Between 2004 and 2013 well production was declining from 355 BOPD to 157 BOPD, on several occasions idle without production efficiency loss team background well, during which intervened service machine to make changes is pump, watching the remains of sand and rubber elastomer by removing completion in March 2014 background will check, touching butt to 6,458 ft, finding 817 ft of possible filler Liner from 6,458 ft to 7,275 ft (Fig. 6), decides ensure the well to perform cleanup of obstruction.

Starts run 2-in CT BHA 1 (Fig. 7) composed by: Rotary shoe type waves 2-3 / 4 in + flapper valve 2-5 / 8 in +5 washpipe 2-5 / 8 in + filter 2- 5/8 in + cyclone Bailer 2-5 / 8 in + Motor 2-3 / 8 in + deployment bar 2-1 / 4 in x 2 in + quick connect 2-1 / 8 in + Motor head assembly 2-1 / 8 in internal connector + 2-1 / 8 in, with a total length of 54.8 ft, with circulating potassium chloride (KCl) and 300 bpm 0.3 psi pump, performing pull test 50 ft per 1000 ft advanced I descending CT at a speed of 50 ft / min, playing obstruction 6,458 ft to 5,000 lbs weight without observing advance, raised 20 ft and established pumping parameters equal to 1.5 bpm and 2,800 psi, slowly working obstruction 500 lbs weight and 200 psi differential, achieving an 11 ft to 6,469 ft, I see pressure increase circulation 2,800 psi to 3,050 psi (Fig. 8) and decides to raise tool to surface, estimating collecting chamber scrubbers filled tubes entire, low pumping rate KCl 0.3 bpm and 2,500 psi pump lppc in pump.

Starts run 2-in CT BHA 1 (Fig. 7) composed by: Rotary shoe type waves 2-3 / 4 in + flapper valve 2-5 / 8 in +5 washpipe 2-5 / 8 in + filter 2- 5/8 in + cyclone Bailer 2-5 / 8 in + Motor 2-3 / 8 in + deployment bar 2-1 / 4 in x 2 in + quick connect 2-1 / 8 in + Motor head assembly 2-1 / 8 in internal connector + 2-1 / 8 in, with a total length of 54.8 ft, with circulating potassium chloride (KCl) and 300 bpm 0.3 psi pump, performing pull test 50 ft per 1000 ft advanced I descending CT at a speed of 50 ft / min, playing obstruction 6,458 ft to 5,000 lbs weight without observing advance, raised 20 ft and established pumping parameters equal to 1.5 bpm and 2,800 psi, slowly working obstruction 500 lbs weight and 200 psi differential, achieving an 11 ft to 6,469 ft, I see pressure increase circulation 2,800 psi to 3,050 psi (Fig. 8) and decides to raise tool to surface, estimating collecting chamber scrubbers filled tubes entire, low pumping rate KCl 0.3 bpm and 2,500 psi pump lppc in pump.
